div.t-if: not website.clarico_header_style_one and not website.clarico_header_style_two and not website.clarico_header_style_three

ul.t-if: (request and request.is_frontend_multilang and len(languages) > 1) or (website and (editable or translatable))

div.t-attf-class: #{request and request.is_frontend_multilang and len(languages) > 1 and 'dropdown' or 'hidden'} btn-group
